title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 441.136 - Full-time equivalent employees (fte)
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 441.136 - Full-time equivalent employees (fte)

State Regulations

An objective measurement of the personnel employment of
an institution in terms of full-time labor capability. To calculate the number
of full-time equivalent employees, sum all hours for which employees were paid
(whether worked or not) during the year and divide by 2080. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
ยง
441.136

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
